title: RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Datasheet > RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Datasheet > Overview > RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Overview
RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Datasheet > RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Overview
content: The RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module is designed to be part of a production-ready IoT solution in a modular way and must be combined with a WisBlock Core and a Base module.
parent_content:
The RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module is designed to be part of a production-ready IoT solution in a modular way and must be combined with a WisBlock Core and a Base module.  
The RAK12500 uses the u-blox ZOE-M8Q module. It supports a wide variety of satellite data protocols such as GPS, GLONASS, QZSS, and BeiDou. This ensures the retrieval of precise location data. The module features exceptional performance, high sensitivity, and minimal acquisition time. A very suitable module for your low-power IoT solution needs.

title: RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Datasheet > RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK12500 Mounting Mechanism on WisBlock Base Board
content:
**Figure 2** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12500 module on a [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. The RAK12500 module can be mounted on the slots: **SLOT A (UART / I2C Communication) or SLOT C (I2c Communication Only)**.  
> **Image:** RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Mounting
parent_content:
**Figure 2** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK12500 module on a [WisBlock Base](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/wisblock#wisblock-base) board. The RAK12500 module can be mounted on the slots: **SLOT A (UART / I2C Communication) or SLOT C (I2c Communication Only)**.  
> **Image:** RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Mounting

title: RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Datasheet > RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Chipset > RAK12500 GNSS Module Chipset Details [TABLE]
content:
The RAK12500 utilizes a very accurate u-blox ZOE-M8Q chip. See the manufacturer's [u-blox ZOE-M8Q Page](https://www.u-blox.com/en/product/zoe-m8-series) for more details.  
| Vendor | Part number |
| :----: | :---------: |
| u-blox |   ZOE-M8Q   |

| Vendor | Part number |
| :----: | :---------: |
| u-blox |   ZOE-M8Q   |

title: RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Datasheet > RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Pinout [TABLE]
content:
The RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12500 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 3**.  
> **Image:** RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Pinout  
> **TIP:** NOTE
Only the UART and I2C related pin, 1PPS pin, RESET pin, VDD, and GND are connected to this module
parent_content:
The RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module comprises a standard WisBlock connector. The WisBlock connector allows the RAK12500 module to be mounted to a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 3**.  
> **Image:** RAK12500 WisBlock GNSS Location Module Pinout  
> **TIP:** NOTE
Only the UART and I2C related pin, 1PPS pin, RESET pin, VDD, and GND are connected to this module  
If a 24-pin WisBlock Sensor connector is used, the IO used for the output pulse depends on what slot the module is plugged in. The following table shows the default IO used for different slots:  
| SLOT A     | SLOT C   |
| ---------- | -------- |
| UART / I2C | I2C Only |
